recipe.title: Pesto Courgetti with Chicken, Tomato and Spinach
recipe.ingredients: 3 courgettes, spiralised 1 teaspoon salt 1Â½ tablespoons margarine 1 clove garlic, minced (optional) Salt and black pepper to taste Pesto

335g cherry tomatoes, whole Olive oil, drizzled 1 clove garlic, chopped (optional) Basil/thyme/parsley/rosemary, to taste (optional) 200g Vegan Chicken Tenders, cut into bite sized pieces 150g spinach

method.step: Spiralise courgettes (slice ends and keep to the side for roasting). Toss courgetti with the teaspoon of salt, and place in a colander to drain for 30 minutes.

Whilst courgetti is draining, put cherry tomatoes in a single layer on oven tray, drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add garlic/herbs for further flavour (optional). Roast in oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the skins begin to burst.
Prepare chicken tenders as per package instructions (oven at 225oC for 6-8 minutes).
Bring a pot of water to boil. Add courgetti; cook for one minute. Drain; rinse immediately with cold water to stop the cooking process.
Heat margarine in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add courgetti and garlic; cook and stir until just tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in spinach (optional).
Lastly, stir in pesto to taste (do not cook pesto as cooking the basil will lose its fresh aroma)
